attributes.action: Make NO TIME FOR CRIME, benefits in exchange for Community Work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you can't find a job and are claiming benefits then maybe community work should be assigned until employment is found - I'm sure there are plenty of parks that need tending, litter picked up, fences in need of painting...idle hands will turn to crime - FACT. British taxpayers are sick of paying for the idle - FACT. Claiming benefits is a way of life and a choice for the majority - don't give these people a free ride, it's OUR money the Government is giving away. Sign this if you are sick of paying for the lazy.
